articles.description: It is a month since Matt Hancock, the health secretary, pledged that the NHS would open again “within very short order” for routine care.A vast amount of non-coronavirus services were halted in the

It is a month since Matt Hancock, the health secretary, pledged that the NHS would open again within very short order for routine care.
